scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production VITE_API_BASE_URL=https://api.inovara.net/api/v1/client VITE_APP_NAME='Inovara Vending Machine' VITE_APP_VERSION=1.0.0 VITE_ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true VITE_ENABLE_DEBUG_LOGS=false VITE_CACHE_TIME=600000 VITE_STALE_TIME=300000 VITE_ENABLE_CSRF_PROTECTION=true VITE_SESSION_TIMEOUT=3600000 vite build
